LanguageData.sd_luciprod_distillery.label: chemical distillery
LanguageData.sd_luciprod_distillery.description: A distillery will turn 10 units of mechanite oil into 5 raw luciferium batches. These are used to produce luciferium pills at the drug lab.
LanguageData.sd_luciprod_mechstasispod.label: mechanoid stasis pod
LanguageData.sd_luciprod_mechstasispod.description: A pod designed to keep a mechanoid running and harvest his mechanite oil.
